doc:
Jason Watkins (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jason_Watkins_(actor) 0 Jason Watkins (born 28 October 1966 in Albrighton, Shropshire) is an English stage, film and television actor. He played the lead role in the two-part drama The Lost Honour of Christopher Jefferies, for which he won the BAFTA TV Award for Best Actor. He has also played William Herrick in Being Human, Gavin Strong in Trollied, Simon Harwood in W1A and Gordon Shakespeare in the film series Nativity. Jason_Watkins ( born 28_October_1966 in Albrighton , Shropshire ) is an_English_stage , film_and_television_actor . He played the_lead_role in the_two-part_drama The_Lost_Honour of Christopher_Jefferies , for which he won the_BAFTA_TV_Award for Best_Actor . He has_also_played William_Herrick in Being Human , Gavin_Strong in Trollied , Simon_Harwood in W1A and Gordon_Shakespeare in the_film_series_Nativity .
